basic.title: üîê Discord Authorization Required
basic.description:
You need to authorize the bot to use this command.

**When you authorize, you will:**
‚Ä¢ Agree to the bot's terms of service
‚Ä¢ Allow the bot to access your basic information
‚Ä¢ Enable features like DM, hosting, etc.

**Click the button below to start:**
basic.footer: The bot only accesses basic Discord information, no email required

verified.title: üîí Email Verification Required
verified.description:
This command requires email verification via Discord OAuth.

**When you verify, you will:**
‚Ä¢ Agree to the bot's terms of service
‚Ä¢ Grant access to your email
‚Ä¢ Activate your account for premium features

**Click the button below to start:**
verified.footer: Your email will be used for hosting and premium features

banned.title: üö´ Banned from Bot
banned.permanent: Your account has been permanently banned
banned.contact: Please contact admin for more details.

verification.error: ‚ùå An error occurred while checking verification. Please try again later.

verified.title: Email Verification Successful!
verified.description: You have agreed to the terms of service and granted email access.
verified.features: You can now use all bot commands, including premium features.

basic.title: Authorization Successful!
basic.description: You have agreed to the terms of service and authorized the bot.
basic.features: You can now use basic bot commands.
basic.note: **Note:** Some advanced commands require email verification.

success.close: You can close this tab and return to Discord.
